Title: Subarray Squares
Description: Given an array of n elements, your task is to divide into k subarrays. The cost of each subarray is the square of the sum of the values in the subarray. What is the minimum total cost if you act optimally?
Input Specification:
The first input line has two integers n and k: the array elements and the number of subarrays. The array elements are numbered 1,2,\dots,n. 
 The second line has n integers x_1,x_2,\dots,x_n: the contents of the array.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the minimum total cost.
